# Problem

RFC 9457 Problem Details

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**title** | **str** | A short, human-readable summary of the problem type | 
**status** | **int** | The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem | 
**type** | **str** | A URI reference that identifies the problem type | [optional] 
**detail** | **str** | A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem | [optional] 
**instance** | **str** | A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem | [optional]
